Production Co: Rat Entertainment, Touchstone Pictures, Permut Presentations, Kumbaya Productions Inc.
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, SDDS, Surround, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: A successful New York investment banker Daryl Chase (Orlando Jones) is suddenly on the run and has to switch identities with low-life petty thief Freddy Tiffany (Eddie Griffin). Until now, Daryl's led a charmed life. However, everything is turned upside down when he is framed for laundering millions for a Mexican drug cartel. He makes a run to the border in an attempt to clear his name.
Title: Double Take
